person_say: I always disagree with my parents. How can I improve our communication?
animal_say: That's tough! How do these disagreements make you feel, and what do you want to communicate differently?

person_say: These disagreements make me feel really frustrated and misunderstood. I want to communicate my feelings and viewpoints more clearly, but I'm not sure how to do that.
animal_say: I get it! Meeting Bruno, our mindfulness expert, could help you express your feelings clearly. Want to connect with him?

person_say: Yes, I would love to connect with Bruno to help me express my feelings more clearly!
animal_say: Fantastic! Bruno will guide you in expressing your feelings. Let's go meet him and get started!
